mosinstall.name: EZ Autos Search Filter Module
mosinstall.author: K.J. Strickland
mosinstall.description: This module shows an EZ Autos search filter for use in a side-bar module position - or anywhere you have a module position available.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: usecat
param.label: Use Category
param.description: Select whether to display the vehicle category list

param.name: usemakmod
param.label: Use Make/Model
param.description: Select whether to display the vehicle make/model lists

param.name: usetrans
param.label: Use Transmission
param.description: Select whether to display the transmission list

param.name: useengine
param.label: Use Engine Size
param.description: Select whether to display the engine size list

param.name: usefuel
param.label: Use Fuel Type
param.description: Select whether to display the fuel type list

param.name: usecolour
param.label: Use Colour List
param.description: Select whether to display the vehicle colour list

param.name: usedoors
param.label: Use Door Number
param.description: Select whether to display the door number list

param.name: usebody
param.label: Use Body Type
param.description: Select whether to display the body type list

param.name: useyear
param.label: Use Min/Max Year
param.description: Select whether to display the min/max year list

param.name: usemileage
param.label: Use Maximum Mileage
param.description: Select whether to display the maximum mileage field

param.name: usecond
param.label: Use Condition
param.description: Select whether to use the vehicle condition list

param.name: usepcode
param.label: Use Zip/Postcode Radius
param.description: Select whether to use the zip/postcode radius search fields

param.name: tagit_demo
param.label: Use demonstrator selector option
param.description: Select whether to display the demonstrator item in the vehicle condition list

param.name: tagit_asnew
param.label: Use 'As New' selector option
param.description: Select whether to display the 'as new' item in the vehicle condition list

param.name: tagit_preluv
param.label: Use 'Pre-loved' selector option
param.description: Select whether to use the 'pre-loved' item in the vehicle condition list

param.name: tagit_spare
param.label: Use the spare entry selector option
param.description: Select whether to use the 'spare entry' item in the vehicle condition list. If you need to use this - remember to give it a new name by editing the language file
